00078     template<class Derived>
00079     struct self_base
00080     {
00081         operators::call_operator0<Derived> operator()() const
00082         {
00083             return 0;
00084         }
00085         
00086 #define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_MACRO(n) \
00087         template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n, class A)> \
00088         BOOST_PP_CAT(operators::call_operator, n)< \
00089             Derived \
00090             BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, A) \
00091         >\
00092         operator()( \
00093             BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(n, A, const& BOOST_PP_INTERCEPT) \
00094         ) const \
00095         { \
00096             return 0; \
00097         }
00098 
00099 #define BOOST_PP_LOCAL_LIMITS (1, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY)
00100 #include BOOST_PP_LOCAL_ITERATE()
00101 
00102     };
00103 
00104     struct self_type : self_base<self_type>
00105     {
00106     };
00107 
00108     struct const_self_type : self_base<const_self_type>
00109     {
00110     };

00112 namespace detail {

00114     template<class W, class T>
00115     struct unwrap_parameter_type
00116     {
00117         typedef typename boost::mpl::eval_if<
00118             boost::is_same<T, self_type>
00119           , boost::mpl::identity<W&>
00120           , boost::mpl::eval_if<
00121                 boost::is_same<T, const_self_type>
00122               , boost::mpl::identity<W const&>
00123               , unwrap_other<T>
00124             >
00125         >::type type;
00126     };
00127 
00128     template<class Derived, class A, class B>
00129     struct binary_operator 
00130         : operator_<binary_operator<Derived, A, B> >
00131     {
00132         binary_operator(int) {}
00133 
00134         template<class T, class Policies>
00135         struct apply 
00136         {
00137             typedef typename unwrap_parameter_type<T, A>::type arg0;
00138             typedef typename unwrap_parameter_type<T, B>::type arg1;
00139 
00140             static void execute(lua_State* L, arg0 _0, arg1 _1)
00141             {
00142                 Derived::template apply<arg0, arg1, Policies>::execute(
00143                     L, _0, _1);
00144             }
00145         };
00146 
00147         static char const* name()
00148         {
00149             return Derived::name();
00150         }
00151     };
00152 
00153     template<class Derived, class A>
00154     struct unary_operator 
00155         : operator_<unary_operator<Derived, A> >
00156     {
00157         unary_operator(int) {}
00158         
00159         template<class T, class Policies>
00160         struct apply
00161         {
00162             typedef typename unwrap_parameter_type<T, A>::type arg0;
00163 
00164             static void execute(lua_State* L, arg0 _0)
00165             {
00166                 Derived::template apply<arg0, Policies>::execute(L, _0);
00167             }
00168         };
00169 
00170         static char const* name()
00171         {
00172             return Derived::name();
00173         }
00174     };
00175 
00176     template<class Policies>
00177     inline void operator_result(lua_State* L, operator_void_return, Policies*)
00178     {
00179     }
00180 
00181     namespace mpl = boost::mpl;
00182 
00183     template<class T, class Policies>
00184     inline void operator_result(lua_State* L, T const& x, Policies*)
00185     {
00186         typedef typename find_conversion_policy<
00187             0
00188           , Policies
00189         >::type cv_policy;
00190 
00191         typename mpl::apply_wrap2<cv_policy,T,cpp_to_lua>::type cv;
00192 
00193         cv.apply(L, x);
00194     }
00195 
00196 }} // namespace detail::luabind

00200 #define LUABIND_BINARY_OPERATOR(name_, op) \
00201     namespace operators { \
00202 \
00203         struct name_ \
00204         { \
00205             template<class T0, class T1, class Policies> \
00206             struct apply \
00207             { \
00208                 static void execute(lua_State* L, T0 _0, T1 _1) \
00209                 { \
00210                     detail::operator_result(L, _0 op _1, (Policies*)0); \
00211                 } \
00212             }; \
00213 \
00214             static char const* name() \
00215             { \
00216                 return "__" # name_; \
00217             } \
00218         }; \
00219 \
00220     } \
00221     \
00222     template<class T, class U> \
00223     detail::binary_operator< \
00224         operators::name_ \
00225       , U \
00226       , T \
00227     > \
00228     inline operator op(self_base<U>, T const&) \
00229     { \
00230         return 0; \
00231     } \
00232     \
00233     template<class T, class U> \
00234     detail::binary_operator< \
00235         operators::name_ \
00236       , T \
00237       , U \
00238     > \
00239     inline operator op(T const&, self_base<U>) \
00240     { \
00241         return 0; \
00242     } \
00243     \
00244     detail::binary_operator< \
00245         operators::name_ \
00246       , self_type \
00247       , self_type \
00248     > \
00249     inline operator op(self_type, self_type) \
00250     { \
00251         return 0; \
00252     } \
00253     \
00254     detail::binary_operator< \
00255         operators::name_ \
00256       , self_type \
00257       , const_self_type \
00258     > \
00259     inline operator op(self_type, const_self_type) \
00260     { \
00261         return 0; \
00262     } \
00263     \
00264     detail::binary_operator< \
00265         operators::name_ \
00266       , const_self_type \
00267       , self_type \
00268     > \
00269     inline operator op(const_self_type, self_type) \
00270     { \
00271         return 0; \
00272     } \
00273     \
00274     detail::binary_operator< \
00275         operators::name_ \
00276       , const_self_type \
00277       , const_self_type \
00278     > \
00279     inline operator op(const_self_type, const_self_type) \
00280     { \
00281         return 0; \
00282     }

00293 #undef LUABIND_UNARY_OPERATOR
00294 
00295 #define LUABIND_UNARY_OPERATOR(name_, op, fn) \
00296     namespace operators { \
00297 \
00298         struct name_ \
00299         { \
00300             template<class T, class Policies> \
00301             struct apply \
00302             { \
00303                 static void execute(lua_State* L, T x) \
00304                 { \
00305                     detail::operator_result(L, op(x), (Policies*)0); \
00306                 } \
00307             }; \
00308 \
00309             static char const* name() \
00310             { \
00311                 return "__" # name_; \
00312             } \
00313         }; \
00314 \
00315     } \
00316     \
00317     template<class T> \
00318     detail::unary_operator< \
00319         operators::name_ \
00320       , T \
00321     > \
00322     inline fn(self_base<T>) \
00323     { \
00324         return 0; \
00325     }
00326 
00327     template<class T>
00328     std::string tostring_operator(T const& x)
00329     {
00330 #ifdef LUABIND_NO_STRINGSTREAM
00331         std::strstream s;
00332         s << x << std::ends;
00333 #else
00334         std::stringstream s;
00335         s << x;
00336 #endif
00337         return s.str();
00338     }
00339     
00340     LUABIND_UNARY_OPERATOR(tostring, tostring_operator, tostring)
00341     LUABIND_UNARY_OPERATOR(unm, -, operator-)
00342 
00343 #undef LUABIND_BINARY_OPERATOR
